meanings.definition: A type of maize or corn.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy eating mealie with butter.
meanings.sent2: The farmer harvested a large mealie crop this year.
meanings.sent3: Why did the mealie go to school? To become a smart corn!
meanings.sent4: The golden mealie fields stretched as far as the eye could see.
meanings.sent5: The smell of roasted mealie filled the air at the fair.

meanings.definition: A South African term for a corn cob.
meanings.sent1: She roasted the mealie over the fire.
meanings.sent2: The children enjoyed chewing on the mealie after dinner.
meanings.sent3: The mealie told a joke, but it was too corny!
meanings.sent4: The mealie looked like a golden torch in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The mealie was the star of the braai with its smoky flavor.

meanings.definition: A South African term for a maize kernel.
meanings.sent1: The mealie popped in the pan.
meanings.sent2: She ground the mealie into flour for baking.
meanings.sent3: Why did the mealie refuse to fight? It was a-MAIZE-ing peacekeeper!
meanings.sent4: The mealie was a tiny yellow gem in the palm of her hand.
meanings.sent5: The mealie burst with flavor when bitten into.
